name: Carlos González
role: Lead Artist, Character Artist, Environment Artist, UI/UX Artist, VFX Artist
bio: As Lead Artist, I was responsible for establishing and overseeing the visual direction of the game from concept to final implementation. I led a team of artists, ensuring a cohesive style across environments, characters, UI, and animations. I collaborated closely with design and programming teams to align art with gameplay and performance goals. I also contributed key visual assets and guided the integration of artwork into the game engine, balancing aesthetics with technical constraints.
